reviewText: I caught this movie on this morning and it was great. Sad that he killed himself over her evil a$$

I have been looking for this movie on DVD ever since I saw it the first time.  I would so much appreciate seeing it here on Amazon for purchase.  It must be in my collection of great movies!!!  5 Stars for sure.

This is an outstanding movie and the acting on the parts of both Anne Heche and Eric Roberts is fantastic ( never did it feel as if they were acting, it was that real of an experience to behold).  This however for me comes as no surprise since Anne Heche is absolutely remarkable in Return to Paradise (plus many more) and Eric Roberts ins Star80.
Cant believe this is not out in the states , amazing thriller everyone should own it . 5 stars !!!! Great acting from ERIC ROBERTS and ANNE HECHE
